Raag Kaanraa − Part 001 1294 : 1 Raag Kaanraa, Chau−Padas, Fourth Mehl, First House: 1294 : 2 One Universal Creator God. Truth Is The Name. Creative Being Personified. No Fear. No Hatred. Image Of The Undying. Beyond Birth. Self−Existent. By Guru's Grace: 1294 : 3 Meeting with the Holy people, my mind blossoms forth. 1294 : 4 I am a sacrifice, a sacrifice, a sacrifice, a sacrifice to those Holy beings; joining the Sangat, the Congregation, I am carried across to the other side. ||1||Pause|| 1294 : 5 O Lord, Har, Har, please bless me with Your Mercy, God, that I may fall at the feet of the Holy. 1294 : 6 Blessed, blessed are the Holy, who know the Lord God. Meeting with the Holy, even sinners are saved. ||1|| 1294 : 7 The mind roams and rambles all around in all directions. Meeting with the Holy, it is overpowered and brought under control, 1294 : 8 just as when the fisherman spreads his net over the water, he catches and overpowers the fish. ||2|| 2

1294 : 9 The Saints, the Saints of the Lord, are noble and good. Meeting with the humble Saints, filth is washed away. 1294 : 10 All the sins and egotism are washed away, like soap washing dirty clothes. ||3|| 1294 : 11 According to that pre−ordained destiny inscribed on my forehead by my Lord and Master, I have enshrined the Feet of the Guru, the True Guru, within my heart. 1294 : 12 I have found God, the Destroyer of all poverty and pain; servant Nanak is saved through the Naam. ||4||1|| 1294 : 13 Kaanraa, Fourth Mehl: 1294 : 14 My mind is the dust of the feet of the Saints. 1294 : 15 Joining the Sangat, the Congregation, I listen to the sermon of the Lord, Har, Har. My crude and uncultured mind is drenched with the Love of the Lord. ||1||Pause|| 1294 : 16 I am thoughtless and unconscious; I do not know God's state and extent. The Guru has made me thoughtful and conscious. 1294 : 17 God is Merciful to the meek; He has made me His Own. My mind chants and meditates on the Name of the Lord, Har, Har. ||1|| Raag Kaanraa − Part 001 3

1294 : 18 Meeting with the Lord's Saints, the Beloveds of the mind, I would cut out my heart, and offer it to them. 1294 : 19 Meeting with the Lord's Saints, I meet with the Lord; this sinner has been sanctified. ||2|| 1294 : 20 The humble servants of the Lord are said to be exalted in this world; meeting with them, even stones are softened. −− Raag Kaanraa − Part 001 −− Raag Kaanraa − Part 001 4

Raag Kaanraa − Part 002 1295 : 21 I cannot even describe the noble grandeur of such humble beings; the Lord, Har, Har, has made them sublime and exalted. ||3|| 1295 : 22 You, Lord are the Great Merchant−Banker; O God, my Lord and Master, I am just a poor peddler; please bless me with the wealth. 1295 : 23 Please bestow Your Kindness and Mercy upon servant Nanak, God, so that he may load up the merchandise of the Lord, Har, Har. ||4||2|| 1295 : 24 Kaanraa, Fourth Mehl: 1295 : 25 O mind, chant the Name of the Lord, and be enlightened. 1295 : 26 Meet with the Saints of the Lord, and focus your love; remain balanced and detached within your own household. ||1||Pause|| 1295 : 27 I chant the Name of the Lord, Nar−Har, within my heart; God the Merciful has shown His Mercy. 1295 : 28 Night and day, I am in ecstasy; my mind has blossomed forth, rejuvenated. I am trying − I hope to meet my Lord. ||1|| 5

1295 : 29 I am in love with the Lord, my Lord and Master; I love Him with every breath and morsel of food I take. 1295 : 30 My sins were burnt away in an instant; the noose of the bondage of Maya was loosened. ||2|| 1295 : 31 I am such a worm! What karma am I creating? What can I do? I am a fool, a total idiot, but God has saved me. 1295 : 32 I am unworthy, heavy as stone, but joining the Sat Sangat, the True Congregation, I am carried across to the other side. ||3|| 1295 : 33 The Universe which God created is all above me; I am the lowest, engrossed in corruption. 1295 : 34 With the Guru, my faults and demerits have been erased. Servant Nanak has been united with God Himself. ||4||3|| 1295 : 35 Kaanraa, Fourth Mehl: 1295 : 36 O my mind, chant the Name of the Lord, through the Guru's Word. 1295 : 37 The Lord, Har, Har, has shown me His Mercy, and my evil−mindedness, love of duality and sense of alienation are totally gone, thanks to the Lord of the Universe. ||1||Pause|| Raag Kaanraa − Part 002 6

1295 : 38 There are so many forms and colors of the Lord. The Lord is pervading each and every heart, and yet He is hidden from view. 1295 : 39 Meeting with the Lord's Saints, the Lord is revealed, and the doors of corruption are shattered. ||1|| 1295 : 40 The glory of the Saintly beings is absolutely great; they lovingly enshrine the Lord of Bliss and Delight within their hearts. 1295 : 41 Meeting with the Lord's Saints, I meet with the Lord, just as when the calf is seen − the cow is there as well. ||2|| 1295 : 42 The Lord, Har, Har, is within the humble Saints of the Lord; they are exalted − they know, and they inspire others to know as well. 1295 : 43 The fragrance of the Lord permeates their hearts; they have abandoned the foul stench. ||3|| 1295 : 44 You make those humble beings Your Own, God; You protect Your Own, O Lord. 1295 : 45 The Lord is servant Nanak's companion; the Lord is his sibling, mother, father, relative and relation. ||4||4|| 1295 : 46 Raag Kaanraa − Part 002 7

Kaanraa, Fourth Mehl: 1295 : 47 O my mind, consciously chant the Name of the Lord, Har, Har. 1295 : 48 The commodity of the Lord, Har, Har, is locked in the fortress of Maya; through the Word of the Guru's Shabad, I have conquered the fortress. ||1||Pause|| 1295 : 49 In false doubt and superstition, people wander all around, lured by love and emotional attachment to their children and families. 1295 : 50 But just like the passing shade of the tree, your body−wall shall crumble in an instant. ||1|| 1295 : 51 The humble beings are exalted; they are my breath of life and my beloveds; meeting them, my mind is filled with faith. 1295 : 52 Deep within the heart, I am happy with the Pervading Lord; with love and joy, I dwell upon the Steady and Stable Lord. ||2|| −− Raag Kaanraa − Part 002 −− Raag Kaanraa − Part 002 8

Raag Kaanraa − Part 003 1296 : 53 The humble Saints, the Saints of the Lord, are noble and sublime; meeting them, the mind is tinged with love and joy. 1296 : 54 The Lord's Love never fades away, and it never wears off. Through the Lord's Love, one goes and meets the Lord, Har, Har. ||3|| 1296 : 55 I am a sinner; I have committed so many sins. The Guru has cut them, cut them, and hacked them off. 1296 : 56 The Guru has placed the healing remedy of the Name of the Lord, Har, Har, into my mouth. Servant Nanak, the sinner, has been purified and sanctified. ||4||5|| 1296 : 57 Kaanraa, Fourth Mehl: 1296 : 58 Chant, O my mind, the Name of the Lord, the Lord of the Universe. 1296 : 59 I was caught in the whirlpool of poisonous sin and corruption. The True Guru gave me His Hand; He lifted me up and pulled me out. ||1||Pause|| 1296 : 60 O my Fearless, Immaculate Lord and Master, please save me − I am a sinner, a sinking stone. 9

1296 : 61 I am lured and enticed by sexual desire, anger, greed and corruption, but associating with You, I am carried across, like iron in the wooden boat. ||1|| 1296 : 62 You are the Great Primal Being, the most Inaccessible and Unfathomable Lord God; I search for You, but cannot find Your depth. 1296 : 63 You are the farthest of the far, beyond the beyond, O my Lord and Master; You alone know Yourself, O Lord of the Universe. ||2|| 1296 : 64 I meditate on the Name of the Unseen and Unfathomable Lord; joining the Sat Sangat, the True Congregation, I have found the Path of the Holy. 1296 : 65 Joining the congregation, I listen to the Gospel of the Lord, Har, Har; I meditate on the Lord, Har, Har, and speak the Unspoken Speech. ||3|| 1296 : 66 My God is the Lord of the World, the Lord of the Universe; please save me, O Lord of all Creation. 1296 : 67 Servant Nanak is the slave of the slave of Your slaves. O God, please bless me with Your Grace; please protect me and keep me with Your humble servants. ||4||6|| 1296 : 68 Kaanraa, Fourth Mehl, Partaal, Fifth House: 1296 : 69 Raag Kaanraa − Part 003 10

One Universal Creator God. By The Grace Of The True Guru: 1296 : 70 O mind, meditate on the Lord, the Lord of the World. 1296 : 71 The Lord is the Jewel, the Diamond, the Ruby. 1296 : 72 The Lord fashions the Gurmukhs in His Mint. 1296 : 73 O Lord, please, please, be Merciful to me. ||1||Pause|| 1296 : 74 Your Glorious Virtues are inaccessible and unfathomable; how can my one poor tongue describe them? O my Beloved Lord, Raam, Raam, Raam, Raam. 1296 : 75 O Dear Lord, You, You, You alone know Your Unspoken Speech. I have become enraptured, enraptured, enraptured, meditating on the Lord. ||1|| 1296 : 76 The Lord, my Lord and Master, is my Companion and my Breath of Life; the Lord is my Best Friend. My mind, body and tongue are attuned to the Lord, Har, Haray, Haray. The Lord is my Wealth and Property. 1296 : 77 She alone obtains her Husband Lord, who is so pre−destined. Through the Guru's Teachings, she sings the Glorious Praises of the Lord, Har, Har, Haray, Haray. I am a sacrifice, a sacrifice, I am a sacrifice, a sacrifice to the Lord, O servan Raag Kaanraa − Part 003 11

1296 : 78 Kaanraa, Fourth Mehl: 1296 : 79 Sing the Glorious Praises of the Lord, the Lord of the Universe. 1296 : 80 Let my one tongue become two hundred thousand 1296 : 81 − with them all, I will meditate on the Lord, Har, Har, and chant the Word of the Shabad. 1296 : 82 O Lord, please, please, be Merciful to me. ||1||Pause|| 1296 : 83 O Lord, my Lord and Master, please be Merciful to me; please enjoin me to serve You. I chant and meditate on the Lord, I chant and meditate on the Lord, I chant and meditate on the Lord of the Universe. 1296 : 84 Your humble servants chant and meditate on You, O Lord; they are sublime and exalted. I am a sacrifice, a sacrifice, a sacrifice, a sacrifice to them. ||1|| −− Raag Kaanraa − Part 003 −− Raag Kaanraa − Part 003 12

Raag Kaanraa − Part 004 1297 : 85 O Lord, You are the Greatest of the Great, the Greatest of the Great, the most Lofty and High. You do whatever You please. 1297 : 86 Servant Nanak drinks in the Ambrosial Nectar through the Guru's Teachings. Blessed, blessed, blessed, blessed, blessed and praised is the Guru. ||2||2||8|| 1297 : 87 Kaanraa, Fourth Mehl: 1297 : 88 O mind, meditate and vibrate on the Lord, Raam, Raam. 1297 : 89 He has no form or feature − He is Great! 1297 : 90 Joining the Sat Sangat, the True Congregation, vibrate and meditate on the Lord. 1297 : 91 This is the high destiny written on your forehead. ||1||Pause|| 1297 : 92 That household, that mansion, in which the Lord's Praises are sung − that home is filled with ecstasy and joy; so vibrate and meditate on the Lord, Raam, Raam, Raam. 1297 : 93 13

Sing the Glorious Praises of the Name of the Lord, the Beloved Lord. Through the Teachings of the Guru, the Guru, the True Guru, you shall find peace. So vibrate and meditate on the Lord, Har, Haray, Har, Haray, Haray, the Lord, Raam, Raam, 1297 : 94 You are the Support of the whole universe, Lord; O Merciful Lord, You, You, You are the Creator of all, Raam, Raam, Raam. 1297 : 95 Servant Nanak seeks Your Sanctuary; please bless him with the Guru's Teachings, that he may vibrate and meditate on the Lord, Raam, Raam, Raam. ||2||3||9|| 1297 : 96 Kaanraa, Fourth Mehl: 1297 : 97 I eagerly kiss the Feet of the True Guru. 1297 : 98 Meeting Him, the Path to the Lord becomes smooth and easy. 1297 : 99 I lovingly vibrate and meditate on the Lord, and gulp down His Sublime Essence. 1297 : 100 The Lord has written this destiny on my forehead. ||1||Pause|| 1297 : 101 Some perform the six rituals and rites; the Siddhas, seekers and Yogis put on all sorts of pompous shows, with their hair all tangled and matted. 1297 : 102 Raag Kaanraa − Part 004 14

Yoga − Union with the Lord God − is not obtained by wearing religious robes; the Lord is found in the Sat Sangat, the True Congregation, and the Guru's Teachings. The humble Saints throw the doors wide open. ||1|| 1297 : 103 O my Lord and Master, You are the farthest of the far, utterly unfathomable. You are totally pervading the water and the land. You alone are the One and Only Unique Lord of all creation. 1297 : 104 You alone know all Your ways and means. You alone understand Yourself. Servant Nanak's Lord God is in each heart, in every heart, in the home of each and every heart. ||2||4||10|| 1297 : 105 Kaanraa, Fourth Mehl: 1297 : 106 O mind, chant and meditate on the Lord, the Lord of the Universe. 1297 : 107 The Lord, Har, Har, is inaccessible and unfathomable. 1297 : 108 Through the Guru's Teachings, my intellect attains the Lord God. 1297 : 109 This is the pre−ordained destiny written on my forehead. ||1||Pause|| 1297 : 110 Collecting the poison of Maya, people think of all sorts of evil. But peace is found only by vibrating and meditating on the Lord; with the Saints, in the Sangat, the Society of the Saints, meet the True Guru, the Holy Guru. Raag Kaanraa − Part 004 15

1297 : 111 Just as when the iron slag is transmuted into gold by touching the Philosopher's Stone − when the sinner joins the Sangat, he becomes pure, through the Guru's Teachings. ||1|| 1297 : 112 Just like the heavy iron which is carried across on the wooden raft, sinners are carried across in the Saadh Sangat, the Company of the Holy, and the Guru, the True Guru, the Holy Guru. 1297 : 113 There are four castes, four social classes, and four stages of life. Whoever meets the Guru, Guru Nanak, is himself carried across, and he carries all his ancestors and generations across as well. ||2||5||11|| 1297 : 114 Kaanraa, Fourth Mehl: 1297 : 115 Sing the Praises of the Lord God. 1297 : 116 Singing His Praises, sins are washed away. 1297 : 117 Through the Word of the Guru's Teachings, listen to His Praises with your ears. 1297 : 118 The Lord shall be Merciful to you. ||1||Pause|| −− Raag Kaanraa − Part 004 −− Raag Kaanraa − Part 004 16

Raag Kaanraa − Part 005 1298 : 119 Your humble servants focus their consciousness and meditate on You with one−pointed mind; those Holy beings find peace, chanting the Name of the Lord, Har, Har, the Treasure of Bliss. 1298 : 120 They sing Your Praises, God, meeting with the Holy, the Holy people, and the Guru, the True Guru, O Lord God. ||1|| 1298 : 121 They alone obtain the fruit of peace, within whose hearts You, O my Lord and Master, abide. They cross over the terrifying world−ocean − they are known as the Lord's devotees. 1298 : 122 Please enjoin me to their service, Lord, please enjoin me to their service. O Lord God, You, You, You, You, You are the Lord of servant Nanak. ||2||6||12|| 1298 : 123 Kaanraa, Fifth Mehl, Second House: 1298 : 124 One Universal Creator God. By The Grace Of The True Guru: 1298 : 125 Sing the Glorious Praises of the Lord of the World, the Treasure of Mercy. 1298 : 126 The True Guru is the Destroyer of pain, the Giver of peace; meeting Him, one is totally fulfilled. ||1||Pause|| 17

1298 : 127 Meditate in remembrance on the Naam, the Support of the mind. 1298 : 128 Millions of sinners are carried across in an instant. ||1|| 1298 : 129 Whoever remembers his Guru, 1298 : 130 shall not suffer sorrow, even in dreams. ||2|| 1298 : 131 Whoever keeps his Guru enshrined within 1298 : 132 − that humble being tastes the sublime essence of the Lord with his tongue. ||3|| 1298 : 133 Says Nanak, the Guru has been Kind to me; 1298 : 134 here and herafter, my face is radiant. ||4||1|| 1298 : 135 Kaanraa, Fifth Mehl: 1298 : 136 I worship and adore You, my Lord and Master. Raag Kaanraa − Part 005 18

1298 : 137 Standing up and sitting down, while sleeping and awake, with each and every breath, I meditate on the Lord. ||1||Pause|| 1298 : 138 The Naam, the Name of the Lord, abides within the hearts of those, 1298 : 139 whose Lord and Master blesses them with this gift. ||1|| 1298 : 140 Peace and tranquility come into the hearts of those 1298 : 141 who meet their Lord and Master, through the Word of the Guru. ||2|| 1298 : 142 Those whom the Guru blesses with the Mantra of the Naam are wise, and blessed with all powers,. ||3|| 1298 : 143 Says Nanak, I am a sacrifice to those 1298 : 144 who are blessed with the Name in this Dark Age of Kali Yuga. ||4||2|| 1298 : 145 Kaanraa, Fifth Mehl: 1298 : 146 Raag Kaanraa − Part 005 19

Sing the Praises of God, O my tongue. 1298 : 147 Humbly bow to the Saints, over and over again; through them, the Feet of the Lord of the Universe shall come to abide within you. ||1||Pause|| 1298 : 148 The Door to the Lord cannot be found by any other means. 1298 : 149 When He becomes Merciful, we come to meditate on the Lord, Har, Har. ||1|| 1298 : 150 The body is not purified by millions of rituals. 1298 : 151 The mind is awakened and enlightened only in the Saadh Sangat, the Company of the Holy. ||2|| 1298 : 152 Thirst and desire are not quenched by enjoying the many pleasures of Maya. 1298 : 153 Chanting the Naam, the Name of the Lord, total peace is found. ||3|| 1298 : 154 When the Supreme Lord God becomes Merciful, 1298 : 155 says Nanak, then one is rid of worldly entanglements. ||4||3|| Raag Kaanraa − Part 005 20

1298 : 156 Kaanraa, Fifth Mehl: 1298 : 157 Beg for such blessings from the Lord of the Universe: 1298 : 158 to work for the Saints, and the Saadh Sangat, the Company of the Holy. Chanting the Name of the Lord, the supreme status is obtained. ||1||Pause|| 1298 : 159 Worship the Feet of Your Lord and Master, and seek His Sanctuary. 1298 : 160 Take joy in whatever God does. ||1|| 1298 : 161 This precious human body becomes fruitful, −− Raag Kaanraa − Part 005 −− Raag Kaanraa − Part 005 21

Raag Kaanraa − Part 006 1299 : 162 when the True Guru shows His Kindness. ||2|| 1299 : 163 The house of ignorance, doubt and pain is destroyed, 1299 : 164 for those within whose hearts the Guru's Feet abide. ||3|| 1299 : 165 In the Saadh Sangat, lovingly meditate on God. 1299 : 166 Says Nanak, you shall obtain the Perfect Lord. ||4||4|| 1299 : 167 Kaanraa, Fifth Mehl: 1299 : 168 Devotion is the natural quality of God's devotees. 1299 : 169 Their bodies and minds are blended with their Lord and Master; He unites them with Himself. ||1||Pause|| 1299 : 170 The singer sings the songs, 22

1299 : 171 but she alone is saved, within whose consciousness the Lord abides. ||1|| 1299 : 172 The one who sets the table sees the food, 1299 : 173 but only one who eats the food is satisfied. ||2|| 1299 : 174 People disguise themselves with all sorts of costumes, 1299 : 175 but in the end, they are seen as they truly are. ||3|| 1299 : 176 Speaking and talking are all just entanglements. 1299 : 177 O slave Nanak, the true way of life is excellent. ||4||5|| 1299 : 178 Kaanraa, Fifth Mehl: 1299 : 179 Your humble servant listens to Your Praises with delight. ||1||Pause|| 1299 : 180 My mind is enlightened, gazing upon the Glory of God. Wherever I look, there He is. ||1|| Raag Kaanraa − Part 006 23

1299 : 181 You are the farthest of all, the highest of the far, profound, unfathomable and unreachable. ||2|| 1299 : 182 You are united with Your devotees, through and through; You have removed Your veil for Your humble servants. ||3|| 1299 : 183 By Guru's Grace, Nanak sings Your Glorious Praises; he is intuitively absorbed in Samaadhi. ||4||6|| 1299 : 184 Kaanraa, Fifth Mehl: 1299 : 185 I have come to the Saints to save myself. ||1||Pause|| 1299 : 186 Gazing upon the Blessed Vision of their Darshan, I am sanctified; they have implanted the Mantra of the Lord, Har, Har, within me. ||1|| 1299 : 187 The disease has been eradicated, and my mind has become immaculate. I have taken the healing medicine of the Lord, Har, Har. ||2|| 1299 : 188 I have become steady and stable, and I dwell in the home of peace. I shall never again wander anywhere. ||3|| 1299 : 189 Raag Kaanraa − Part 006 24

By the Grace of the Saints, the people and all their generations are saved; O Nanak, they are not engrossed in Maya. ||4||7|| 1299 : 190 Kaanraa, Fifth Mehl: 1299 : 191 I have totally forgotten my jealousy of others, 1299 : 192 since I found the Saadh Sangat, the Company of the Holy. ||1||Pause|| 1299 : 193 No one is my enemy, and no one is a stranger. I get along with everyone. ||1|| 1299 : 194 Whatever God does, I accept that as good. This is the sublime wisdom I have obtained from the Holy. ||2|| 1299 : 195 The One God is pervading in all. Gazing upon Him, beholding Him, Nanak blossoms forth in happiness. ||3||8|| 1299 : 196 Kaanraa, Fifth Mehl: 1299 : 197 O my Dear Lord and Master, You alone are my Support. 1299 : 198 You are my Honor and Glory; I seek Your Support, and Your Sanctuary. ||1||Pause|| Raag Kaanraa − Part 006 25

1299 : 199 You are my Hope, and You are my Faith. I take Your Name and enshrine it within my heart. 1299 : 200 You are my Power; associating with You, I am embellished and exalted. I do whatever You say. ||1|| 1299 : 201 Through Your Kindness and Compassion, I find peace; when You are Merciful, I cross over the terrifying world−ocean. 1299 : 202 Through the Name of the Lord, I obtain the gift of fearlessness; Nanak places his head on the feet of the Saints. ||2||9|| −− Raag Kaanraa − Part 006 −− Raag Kaanraa − Part 006 26

Raag Kaanraa − Part 007 1300 : 203 Kaanraa, Fifth Mehl: 1300 : 204 In the Sanctuary of the Holy, I focus my consciousness on the Lord's Feet. 1300 : 205 When I was dreaming, I heard and saw only dream−objects. The True Guru has implanted the Mantra of the Naam, the Name of the Lord, within me. ||1||Pause|| 1300 : 206 Power, youth and wealth do not bring satisfaction; people chase after them again and again. 1300 : 207 I have found peace and tranquility, and all my thirsty desires have been quenched, singing His Glorious Praises. ||1|| 1300 : 208 Without understanding, they are like beasts, engrossed in doubt, emotional attachment and Maya. 1300 : 209 But in the Saadh Sangat, the Company of the Holy, the noose of Death is cut, O Nanak, and one intuitively merges in celestial peace. ||2||10|| 1300 : 210 Kaanraa, Fifth Mehl: 27

1300 : 211 Sing of the Lord's Feet within your heart. 1300 : 212 Meditate, meditate in constant remembrance on God, the Embodiment of soothing peace and cooling tranquility. ||1||Pause|| 1300 : 213 All your hopes shall be fulfilled, and the pain of millions of deaths and births shall be gone. ||1|| 1300 : 214 Immerse yourself in the Saadh Sangat, the Company of the Holy, and you shall obtain the benefits of giving charitable gifts, and all sorts of good deeds. 1300 : 215 Sorrow and suffering shall be erased, O Nanak, and you shall never again be devoured by death. ||2||11|| 1300 : 216 Kaanraa, Fifth Mehl, Third House: 1300 : 217 One Universal Creator God. By The Grace Of The True Guru: 1300 : 218 Speak of God's Wisdom in the Sat Sangat, the True Congregation. 1300 : 219 Meditating in remembrance on the Perfect Supreme Divine Light, the Transcendent Lord God, honor and glory are obtained. ||1||Pause|| Raag Kaanraa − Part 007 28

1300 : 220 One's comings and goings in reincarnation cease, and suffering is dispelled, meditating in remembrance in the Saadh Sangat, the Company of the Holy. 1300 : 221 Sinners are sanctified in an instant, in the love of the Supreme Lord God. ||1|| 1300 : 222 Whoever speaks and listens to the Kirtan of the Lord's Praises is rid of evil−mindedness. 1300 : 223 All hopes and desires, O Nanak, are fulfilled. ||2||1||12|| 1300 : 224 Kaanraa, Fifth Mehl: 1300 : 225 The Treasure of the Naam, the Name of the Lord, is found in the Saadh Sangat, the Company of the Holy. 1300 : 226 It is the Companion of the soul, its Helper and Support. ||1||Pause|| 1300 : 227 Continually bathing in the dust of the feet of the Saints, 1300 : 228 the sins of countless incarnations are washed away. ||1|| 1300 : 229 Raag Kaanraa − Part 007 29

The words of the humble Saints are lofty and exalted. 1300 : 230 Meditating, meditating in remembrance, O Nanak, mortal beings are carried across and saved. ||2||2||13|| 1300 : 231 Kaanraa, Fifth Mehl: 1300 : 232 O Holy people, sing the Glorious Praises of the Lord, Har, Haray. 1300 : 233 Mind, body, wealth and the breath of life − all come from God; remembering Him in meditation, pain is taken away. ||1||Pause|| 1300 : 234 Why are you entangled in this and that? Let your mind be attuned to the One. ||1|| 1300 : 235 The place of the Saints is utterly sacred; meet with them, and meditate on the Lord of the Universe. ||2|| 1300 : 236 O Nanak, I have abandoned everything and come to Your Sanctuary. Please let me merge with You. ||3||3||14|| 1300 : 237 Kaanraa, Fifth Mehl: 1300 : 238 Raag Kaanraa − Part 007 30

Gazing upon and beholding my Best Friend, I blossom forth in bliss; my God is the One and Only. ||1||Pause|| 1300 : 239 He is the Image of Ecstasy, Intuitive Peace and Poise. There is no other like Him. ||1|| 1300 : 240 Meditating in remembrance on the Lord, Har, Har, even once, millions of sins are erased. ||2|| −− Raag Kaanraa − Part 007 −− Raag Kaanraa − Part 007 31

Raag Kaanraa − Part 008 1301 : 241 Uttering His Glorious Praises, suffering is eradicated, and the heart becomes tranquil and calm. ||3|| 1301 : 242 Drink in the Sweet, Sublime Ambrosial Nectar, O Nanak, and be imbued with the Love of the Lord. ||4||4||15|| 1301 : 243 Kaanraa, Fifth Mehl: 1301 : 244 O friends, O Saints, come to me. ||1||Pause|| 1301 : 245 Singing the Glorious Praises of the Lord with pleasure and joy, the sins will be erased and thrown away. ||1|| 1301 : 246 Touch your forehead to the feet of the Saints, and your dark household shall be illumined. ||2|| 1301 : 247 By the Grace of the Saints, the heart−lotus blossoms forth. Vibrate and meditate on the Lord of the Universe, and see Him near at hand. ||3|| 1301 : 248 By the Grace of God, I have found the Saints. Over and over again, Nanak is a sacrifice to that moment. ||4||5||16|| 32

1301 : 249 Kaanraa, Fifth Mehl: 1301 : 250 I seek the Sanctuary of Your Lotus Feet, O Lord of the World. 1301 : 251 Save me from emotional attachment, pride, deception and doubt; please cut away these ropes which bind me. ||1||Pause|| 1301 : 252 I am drowning in the world−ocean. 1301 : 253 Meditating in remembrance on the Lord, the Source of Jewels, I am saved. ||1|| 1301 : 254 Your Name, Lord, is cooling and soothing. 1301 : 255 God, my Lord and Master, is Perfect. ||2|| 1301 : 256 You are the Deliverer, the Destroyer of the sufferings of the meek and the poor. 1301 : 257 The Lord is the Treasure of Mercy, the Saving Grace of sinners. ||3|| 1301 : 258 I have suffered the pains of millions of incarnations. Raag Kaanraa − Part 008 33

1301 : 259 Nanak is at peace; the Guru has implanted the Naam, the Name of the Lord, within me. ||4||6||17|| 1301 : 260 Kaanraa, Fifth Mehl: 1301 : 261 Blessed is that love, which is attuned to the Lord's Feet. 1301 : 262 The peace which comes from millions of chants and deep meditations is obtained by perfect good fortune and destiny. ||1||Pause|| 1301 : 263 I am Your helpless servant and slave; I have given up all other support. 1301 : 264 Every trace of doubt has been eradicated, remembering God in meditation.
